Raise your heart rate even when time is short with these high intensity workouts from trainer Sydney Cummings.

Sydney Cummings
Sydney is a personal trainer and fitness coach in the Charlotte North Carolina area. She is a Women's Health Action hero and the go to for all your training needs.
